Welcome to "UK Bank Holidays"! Stay informed about upcoming bank holidays in the UK with this handy Chrome extension. Whether you're planning a weekend getaway or scheduling important meetings, knowing the upcoming holidays can help you better plan your time.

Features:

- Displays a list of upcoming bank holidays in the UK.
- Automatically updates to show the next bank holiday.
- Separate tabs for holidays in England & Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
- First upcoming holiday is highlighted for easy identification.

Never miss another bank holiday again! Install "UK Bank Holidays" now and stay ahead of your schedule.
